Text: Re Replacement of J BoltonThanks for the update Ill make it a point to talk to Jim about this asap Paula wrote Jim talked to me about his resignation again on Friday He indicated that he wished for his replacement to be chosen before he resigns I think he really thought he is helping the board by doing it this way I told him that I did not believe that it was appropriate to arrange things I also told him that he can remain on the board for as long as he lives in his unit And the board will replace him by seeking the best person to fill his seat for the remainder of his term when he resigns He indicated that in the past the next person getting the highest number of votes would be selected I informed him that while this had happened in the past but the board is not obligated to do it in this manner We should ask anyone who is interested to fill this seat to submit hisher name to be considered by the board Houshyar

Re Moving away Cc o My goodness this is a surprise to me I didnt realize that you were thinking of moving Succession planning is important for both the Board and the Social Committee I guess my question relates to when you think you will be moving and how soon you want to get out from under the responsibilities of both activities We might be able to chat briefly tonight if you are coming to the JFF in our place Paula James Bolton wrote This note is a perfect example of how far behind I am on doing those things that need to be do Needless to say Im LOSING By now you probably know we have our unit listed with Rosie Patsy is much easier to live with now that I see the things the way she does All this does mean I need to resign from the Board and from serving as the Board representative to the Social Committee Do you have any preferences as to the date I do that Jim

Re Moving awayJim It is very understandable that you and Patsy might want to be on terra firma considering the challenges and assorted emotions and needs related to the flood the fire and the planes I certainly wish you both well and hope that the new home is everything you want and need it to be Please submit your letter of resignation as soon as you want to I know that all of us appreciate and value your contributions to the Board and to the Spires Im delighted to see that you will still be participating in the Spires Holiday Party Paula James Bolton wrote Paula After being married to Patsy for years I know that when she starts on something my life can return to normal more quickly if I manage to see it her way too Planes fires and floods along with my inability to use the stairs as a means of escape plus her desire to be back on the ground again add up to our moving into a one story patio styled home in a neighborhood just a couple of miles east of San Antonio Just joking about the location Its off I at Eldridge Closing on that property will be the first few days of December Closing on The Spires is not known just yet As far as actually moving out we hope to be in the new place before December I would like to make a transfer of positions before Thanksgiving It has been a joy working and playing with you and Ren these past several years I will treasure those memories you are indeed a very special lady Sincerely Jim Bolton

Re FW Moving awayKim I imagine that this is one of several things Jim wants to handle as quickly as he can Considering the challenges he and Patsy face it is understandable that they would want to be on the ground You have probably read my message to him by now I hope this is a good move for them Paula Watson Kimberly wrote Paula I am out of town beginning this evening and returning home Tuesday night Perhaps we can catch up sometime later this week It looks like Jim wants to transition out soon Have a great week Thanks Kim Original Message From James Bolton mailto Sent Saturday October AM To Cc Watson Kimberly Subject Re Moving away Paula After being married to Patsy for years I know that when she starts on something my life can return to normal more quickly if I manage to see it her way too Planes fires and floods along with my inability to use the stairs as a means of escape plus her desire to be back on the ground again add up to our moving into a one story patio styled home in a neighborhood just a couple of miles east of San Antonio Just joking about the location Its off I at Eldridge Closing on that property will be the first few days of December Closing on The Spires is not known just yet As far as actually moving out we hope to be in the new place before December I would like to make a transfer of positions before Thanksgiving It has been a joy working and playing with you and Ren these past several years I will treasure those memories you are indeed a very special lady Sincerely Jim Bolton This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate Re Replacement of J Bolton Cc Hi The new grandbaby Samantha her mother and father are doing fine She is on her way home this afternoon if the pediatrician believes that she is ready to be released Regarding Jims resignation I agree that we should not be pressured into putting anyone on the board that will not assist us in moving forward and handling the complex issues that the board faces this year Jim indicated that he would wait to resign for as long as he could or until we find a replacement We can discuss this further tonight Im available anytime after pm We could either get together or all go out to dinner at Hungreys or where ever if that works Since the candidates to replace Jew Don Bony are coming to the Spires tomorrow night I would like to attend that meeting if everyone is agreeable Let me know what works for this evening with everyone Paula Watson Kimberly wrote Paula I can make myself available this evening or tomorrow evening to discuss this and other topics as your calendar permits I actually think that we should not be pressured by anyone to fill this position in the next few days If Jim would like to resign effective the end of the month or some other date I think that would be fine It is completely reasonable that the board take some amount of time whatever is necessary to select the right candidate Let me know when you would like to rally Thanks Kim PS Paula congratulations on the new grandbaby I hope mom dad and precious little one are doing well Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday November AM To Watson Kimberly Subject Re Replacement of J Bolton Don had the highest vote th place The board does not have to pick Don As you recall the board elected Kim to replace Muffin and Kim had not even run for the board Lew told me this morning that Jim is waiting to know who his replacement is before he resigns What time are we meeting Where Who Houshyar This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain Re Replacement of J BoltonYou sure can How about meeting in the lobby at PM Paula Watson Kimberly wrote Paula Can I catch a ride with you Thanks Kim Original Message From Paula N ONeill mailto Sent Wednesday November PM To Cc Watson Kimberly Subject Re Replacement of J Bolton Great see you there Paula wrote How about Hungarys at pm Cary will also be with us Houshyar This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Re Replacement of J BoltonKim I agree with the three people on the list as those we should consider Carolyn Brown has had interest in the Board but she is seldom on the same page as other people commonly are and when she was on the board when Ken chaired it almost everyone pulled their hair out after being in meetings with her Houshyar talked with Ken about his interest in being on the board and both Houshyar and I told Ken that it is not a problem for both of us to be on the board at the same time More later as thought come to me Paula Watson Kimberly wrote Paula Although we skimmed the surface on board replacements for Jim we should probably start a list of potential candidates Some of the names we mentioned last night were Bill Tarter Lenore Fenberg Muffin Alfred Any other names that come to mind Will Eucker Art Tammi Semi Carolyn Brown Ken ONeill are other people who have been involved in various efforts Your thoughts Thanks Kim Original Message From Paula N ONeill mailto Sent Wednesday November PM To Watson Kimberly Subject Re Replacement of J Bolton You sure can How about meeting in the lobby at PM Paula Watson Kimberly wrote Paula Can I catch a ride with you Thanks
